gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.common
Class UIHelper

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.common.UIHelper

public final class UIHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a list of utilities to help carry out some general functionality used in UI. This class utilizes singleton pattern.

Since:
CMTS v1.0

findFirstTreeNodeMatchUserObject

public static javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode findFirstTreeNodeMatchUserObject(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode treeNode,
                                                                                       java.lang.Object userObject)
This method will traverse the sub-tree whose root is itself and including itself to find a tree Node whose userObject matches the given one. If none is found, return null.

Parameters:
userObject -
Returns:
the default mutable tree node matching the given object.
